dcterms:description: BDD100K features 100,000 images with a resolution of 1280x720 for object detection and segmentation, covering various weather conditions and times of day. It includes 10 categories for annotation.
dcterms:title: BDD100K

dcterms:creator: Marius Cordts
Mohamed Omran

dcterms:description: Cityscapes provides 5,000 images of urban road scenes at a resolution of 2048x1024 with clear weather for semantic segmentation, with 19 categories.
dcterms:title: Cityscapes

dcterms:creator: Mario Bijelic
Tobias Gruber
Fahim Mannan
Florian Kraus
Werner Ritter
Klaus Dietmayer
Felix Heide
dcterms:description: DENSE provides 12,997 images at a resolution of 1920x1024, capturing diverse weather conditions such as heavy fog and heavy snow.
dcterms:title: DENSE

dcterms:creator: Christos Sakaridis
Dengxin Dai
Luc Van Gool
dcterms:description: ACDC is designed for adverse conditions (fog and snow), including 1,600 images at 2048x1024 for segmentation across 19 categories.
dcterms:title: ACDC

dcterms:creator: Christos Sakaridis
Dengxin Dai
Luc Van Gool
dcterms:description: DarkZurich is tailored for low-light conditions, offering 2,416 unlabeled nighttime images and 151 labeled twilight images for segmentation, with a resolution of 1920x1080, and a focus on urban settings.
dcterms:title: DarkZurich

dcterms:creator: Stephan R Richter
Vibhav Vineet
Stefan Roth
Vladlen Koltun
dcterms:description: GTA (Grand Theft Auto 5) is a role-playing game dataset featuring city driving components with realistic traffic and exhibiting realistic scale biases.
dcterms:title: GTA (Grand Theft Auto 5)

dcterms:creator: German Ros
Laura Sellart
Joanna Materzynska
David Vazquez
Antonio M Lopez
dcterms:description: Synthia is a large collection of synthetic images for semantic segmentation of urban scenes.
dcterms:title: Synthia
